pageProduct.name: Thompson's Ultra Glucosamine 1500mg Plus 180 Tablets
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Thompson's Ultra Glucosamine Plus helps support joint health, bone metabolism and healthy cartilage.

Thompson's Ultra Glucosamine Plus is formulated with a combination of Glucosamine, Chondroitin and Boron to help relieve mild joint pain, joint stiffness and the symptoms of
mild arthritis and mild osteoarthritis. It helps support joint mobility, flexibility and integrity as well as healthy bone metabolism. Glucosamine helps maintain healthy cartilage and may help reduce the wear and tear on joints and ease pain. Derived from seafood.

Size: 180 Tablets

Alcohol Free?: Yes

KEY FEATURES

• Joint care formula
• Contains boron, an important nutrient for bone health
• Helps maintain healthy joints and cartilage
• Helps support healthy joint mobility

Warnings

If symptoms persist consult your healthcare professional.
Do not use if bottle and/or cap seal is missing or broken.

Ingredients

Contains: Each capsule contains:
Glucosamine Hydrochloride: 1.5g (1500mg)
Chondroitin Sulfate - Bovine Sodium: 167mg
equiv. Chondroitin Sulfate 150mg
Boron (as Borax) 3mg

Allergen Free From: Artificial Colours| Artificial Flavours| Artificial Preservatives| Dairy| Egg| Fish| Gluten| Lactose| Nuts| Sesame Seeds| Sugar

Directions

Store below 30°C in a dry place.

Storage Temperature: below 30°C

Recyclable Packaging?: Yes
